title: Il pastor fido: or The faithfull shepheard. Translated out of Italian into English
author: Guarini, Battista, 1538-1612.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Creede] for Simon VVaterson,
notes: The translator is identified on [A]1v as a kinsman of Sir Edward Dymock, i.e. John Dymock? Charles Dymock?.
Running title reads: The faithfull shepheard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
